"Collecting Wizened Wildweed":
"<%me>, you're always super healthy,
so this probably isn't much of a concern for you,
but I know lots of people who haven't been eating
enough vegetables. Plus, lately, I've been getting tons
of requests for wild vegetables, even though the ones
grown on the ship are perfectly fine. So I thought I'd
offer a special menu. I may go over budget with this,
but I'd like to get some of that wizened wildweed.
I hear it tastes great raw. Can you help me?
*Target: Dinians level 24 or higher"

"<%me>さんは
いつも元気で関係ないことかもしれないけど
最近、野菜不足の人が多いのよ。
船内で栽培される野菜だっておいしいのに
最近、天然モノのリクエストが多いし……
スペシャルメニューで提供してみようかな。
予算がオーバーしちゃうかもしれないけど
洗うだけで食べられる「干からびた野草」を
調達してちょうだい！
※Lv.24～のディーニアン達が対象"
